name: Tower!3D Pro
description: Tower!3D Pro will put you in the position of an airport tower controller, one of the most stressful job on the world!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64 bit Windows 7 Pro / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB dedicated video card DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: sound card is required for voice and speech
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64 bit Windows  7 Pro / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.8 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB dedicated video card Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: sound card is required for voice and speech
